Quick reject

“Additional info”

The selected reason for rejection, and any additional information you include, are sent to the journal contact with the rejection email.

Quick reject

Reject “Indonesia Accounting Journal”

Are you sure you want to do this?

Unlock this journal’s application and close

Are you sure you want to do this? Please make sure all of your changes have been saved.

Status

“Change status”

Associate Editors

Set the status to 'In Progress' to signal to the applicant that you have started your review.

Set the status to 'Ready' to alert the Editor that you have completed your review.

Editors

Revert the status to 'In Progress' to signal to the Associate Editor that further work is needed.

Set the status to 'Completed' to alert the Managing Editor that you have completed your review.
